title: harahara smara
sahitya:
hara hara smara hara girijAvara shankara gangAdhara tripurahara mrgadhara

anupallavi

parama dayAkara bhaktajana mandAra bhava bhaya hara shrI panca nadIshvara

caraNam

daNDa dhara garva khaNDa nAshana mArkhaNDa varada vEdaNDa carma dhara 
aNDa piNDa brahmANDa vyApaka pracaNDa kOTi mArtANDa nibhAnga
daNDita dakSAkhaNDalAdi sura maNDala munijana SaNDa kamala mArttANDa
karaLadhara maNDana vakratuNDa janaka shrI caNDikA ramaNa
